raw_data.raw_string: Until 30 June 2017, I was a director of H&H Classics Ltd (a classic car auctions company) of The Motor House, Appleton, Warrington WA4 4SN. From March 2015, I received £1,000 a month for consultancy (about 2 hours a week). (Registered 27 May 2015; updated 04 July 2017)
